author: djrtwo
content:
⚠️ **WARNING** ⚠️ 

There have been a number of recent reports about impersonation scams attempting to "borrow" some ETH because their KYC failed or other weird requests.
Such requests *ARE ALMOST ALWAYS* scams.

Discord makes it easy to have a name collision with another user. When in doubt of someone's identify on any platform, do not act quickly upon requests. Take your time to verify their identity on alternative platforms and maybe ask a friend if something seems sketchy.

In crypto, if it seems like it could be a scam, it probably is.

Be safe out there
